Sentiments Outlook

Apple Channel Remains Key
ByTim KnightStock Markets

Published06/01/2022, 05:32 PM

Apple Channel Remains Key

View all comments (1)1

Tim Knight
Articles(4241)|My Homepage

Follow

AAPL
1.76%

IXIC
0.44%

The title pretty much says it all, but to recap:
Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) is the most important NASDAQ Composite stock there is;
It also happens to be one of the few stocks propping up this still comically-overvalued stock market;
It respected its channel for years until just recently;
Its lower trendline is now resistance, instead of support;
I suspect it‚Äôs going to¬†plunge¬†in short order.

Apple Channel Remains Key

articles.title: Apple is a recommended buy at prices below $150
articles.content:
Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has always been a desire for many investors. At the price of $148, the stock is attractively valued. However, investors may be concerned about the stock‚Äôs price performance. Apple has some of the highest rates of return in the market. The return on equity stands at 149%. articles.title: Apple-1 Computer Signed By Co-Founder Could Fetch $485,000 In Auction
articles.content:
A fully-functional Apple-1 computer that has been autographed by Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak¬†will be put up for auction on eBay, Inc. (NASDAQ: EBAY) on Thursday.
The rare Apple product is owned by Jimmy Grewal,¬†the founder of the "AAPL Collection" private museum.
"A complete working example, referred to as "Schlumberger 2" Apple-1, will be auctioned online on eBay from June 2nd until June 12th, 2022," AAPL Collection said on its website.
The computer is expected to fetch $485,000 at the auction.
Related Link: Apple Generated More Gaming ...
